game.name: Your Weight
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lose Weight or Play Games? I Choose to Lose Weight in a Game! In this decision-driven weight loss simulation game, you'll take various actions to try and successfully shed those extra pounds.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lose Weight or Play Games? I Choose to Lose Weight in a Game! In this decision-driven weight loss simulation game, you'll take various actions to try and successfully shed those extra pounds.
